author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0108 Add support for Derby as Oozie DB
Testcases, when using Derby, run forking on every testcase to avoid some Derby re-initialization issues.

msg: Closes GH-0227 log directory should be created if doesn't exist

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0222 Some time sensitive testcases fail when the test machine is slow
changing the testing strategy to account or workaround a slower than expected execution of the tests.
